attributes.action: Hold a referendum on where the majority of housebuilding should occur in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The southeast of England is currently being overwhelmed by insensitive housing developments that bring significant pressures upon local communities due to lack of appropriate infrastructures, ( health services, education, roads, open spaces). The Government has driven forward a programme of housing developments based on research that needs to be challenged openly so that a wide and honest debate can be facilitated country wide.  If you care about the future of this country it is essential that we address this issue now!
